alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 17 at 9:21PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 921 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated a line of heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This line will move across Guam and cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between a half of an inch and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - The island of Guam. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
